channel.title: Player kicked
channel.description: I made a server and client and I had my friend go on but it sometime randomly kicks him and closes the client down. It only kicks him but not me. Why does this happen and how can I fix it?

item.title: Player kicked
item.dc:creator: @Iownedu89 Iownedu89
item.description:
@Iownedu89 wrote:

I made a server and client and I had my friend go on but it sometime randomly kicks him and closes the client down. It only kicks him but not me. Why does this happen and how can I fix it?
